Articles.Content: First I would like to say I like the option to remove the "Revert Flight" but I would like to suggest there be two Launch options the first is the standard launch option you have today without the option to revert the launch. The second is a launch simulation. Everything would be they same as the first option but you cannot exit the launch with out reverting. In other words you can test your ships and test you plan but cannot gain any rewards from you successes.
